snippet: ROCHMAN--David M.,57, of Ridge, Long Island, died February 2, 2016. Beloved son of Barbara and the late Morty Rochman. Survived by his mother, siblings Diane (Seltzer) and Larry, partner Diane Leonardi, and grandson James. His love for family and friends was renowned. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROCHMAN--David M.,57, of Ridge, Long Island, died February 2, 2016. Beloved son of Barbara and the late Morty Rochman. Survived by his mother, siblings Diane (Seltzer) and Larry, partner Diane Leonardi, and grandson James. His love for family and friends was renowned. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROCHMAN, DAVID M.
